sentences.en: A research fellowship came up at Girton and I applied for it and got it.
sentences.cn: 格顿学院设立了一项研究奖学金，我提出申请并且成功获得。

sentences.en: At Merlin's instigation, Arthur founds the Fellowship of the Round Table.
sentences.cn: 在梅林的建议下，亚瑟王创建了圆桌骑士团。

sentences.en: Charles Darnay -- As was natural -- Asked him , in all good - humour and good - fellowship, what he did mean?
sentences.cn: 查尔斯 - 达尔内自然要问他那是什么意思 —— 问时很快活, 也很亲切.

sentences.en: Even after receiving the " right hand of fellowship ,'sunday school bored me.
sentences.cn: 即使是在获得了“准许入伙 ” 之后, 主日学报还是使我感到枯燥无味.

sentences.en: Han Ji - hyuk is a member of the Korean Red Fellowship, right?
sentences.cn: 韩知赫是朝鲜铁血团的成员, 对不对?

sentences.en: He is presently the medical director for the Fellowship of World Christians.
sentences.cn: 他目前是世界基督徒团契的主任医师。

sentences.en: He went abroad on a fellowship.
sentences.cn: 他在研究员基金资助下出了国.

sentences.en: His brother is a member of a youth fellowship.
sentences.cn: 他哥哥是青年联谊会的会员.

sentences.en: I am applying for a fellowship.
sentences.cn: 我在申请研究生奖学金.
我与那位银行家有交情.

sentences.en: It looks that they'll be admitted to the fellowship.
sentences.cn: 看来他们要被吸收入会了.

sentences.en: Regular outings contribute to a sense of fellowship among co-workers.
sentences.cn: 经常外出游玩可以增进同事之间的友谊。

sentences.en: There was a strong feeling of fellowship amongst the members of the team.
sentences.cn: 那个队各个队员之间有一种强烈的队友情谊.

sentences.en: This good - fellowship - camaraderie - usually occurs through similarity of pursuits.
sentences.cn: 这种融洽 -- 这种志同道合者之间的情谊 -- 通常是通过追求相同的目标而产生的.

sentences.en: We appreciate fellowship in prosperity and adversity.
sentences.cn: 我们赞赏甘苦与共的精神.

sentences.en: You'll lose your fellowship if you do that.
sentences.cn: 你如果做那件事就会丧失研究员职位.

words.tran_cn: 使…与另一个对等；使…与另一个匹敌

phrases.tran_cn: 交际广，好交际；讨人喜欢
出国奖学金；旅行奖学金

trans.tran_cn: 伙伴关系，团体，协会，研究员职位，研究生奖学金
trans.tran_en: a feeling of friendship between people who do things together or share an interest
